comments.body:
```suggestion
    // hold reference to avoid the class loader getting collected by G1GC sbt/zinc#914
    val loader = getLoader(log)
```
It might be worth adding a comment there to avoid future refactoring.
Does this have the same semantics in JDK 8?

Yes. `getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance()` is same as calling `new` with the nullary constructor, which is what `Class#newInstance()` did but it's now deprecated.  https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/11/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/Class.html#newInstance()
